description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. 21 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink with use of red for headings, re-inking, vocalization, punctuation, and some notes. Thick dark cream glazed paper with no chain or laid lines visible. Marginal notes. Foliation in black ink using Arabic numerals (starts over at the beginning of each text). Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Inscription on the pastedown of the upper cover. Label on the spine with title in Arabic. The only date appearing in the copy is in the colophon of text 4, where it is stated that this was copied on Friday 23 Ramaḍān 774 (colophon, fol. 175b). Collation: Paper, fol. 177 + i (endpaper) ; 1-21⁸ 22⁸ (+2, fol. 176-177) ; the quires are numbered using Arabic ordinals in the form "thālithah" ; catchword on the verso of each leaf.
author: Thaʻālibī, ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad, 961 or 962-1037 or 1038
abstract: Collection of four texts on lexicology, written by the same hand.
contents: 1. fol. 1b-90a: Kitāb Fiqh al-lughah wa-sirr al-ʻarabīyah / ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad al-Thaʻālibī.
2. fol. 91a-165a: Kitāb Niẓām al-gharīb fī al-lughah / ʻĪsá ibn Ibrāhīm al-Rabāʻī.
3. fol. 166b-173b: Kitāb al-muthallath / Muḥammad ibn al-Mustanīr Quṭrub.
4. fol. 173b-177b: Kitāb al-muthallath / Abū Isḥāq ibn al-Sarī Zajjāj (al-Zajjājī).
extent: 177, i leaves : paper ; 245 x 169 (185 x 123) mm. bound to 245 x 169 mm.

title.@value: Kitāb fiqh al-lughah wa-sirr al-ʻarabīyah. Kitāb niẓām al-gharīb fī al-lughah ... [etc.].

provenance: Ownership statements on fol. 1a, 90a, 91a, 103a, 165a, 166a, 177b. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Thaʻālibī, ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad, 961 or 962-1037 or 1038
ثعالبي، عبد الملك بن محمد
subject: Arabic language—Lexicology—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Stiffened dark brown leather (very damaged). Paper pastedowns (blue on the upper cover, white on the lower cover).
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
